name: StandardDateFilterDuration

methods.name: getEndDate
methods.description: Returns the end date of the date filter.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the display name of the date filter. Possible values are relative date filters—like Current FY and Current FQ—and custom date filters.

methods.name: getStartDate
methods.description: Returns the start date of the date filter.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the API name of the date filter. Possible values are relative date filters—like THIS_FISCAL_YEAR and NEXT_FISCAL_QUARTER—and custom date filters.

description: Contains information about each standard date filter—also referred to as a relative date filter. It contains the API name and display label of the standard date filter duration as well as the start and end dates.
